title: Whispered Lies
description: Atonement is my only salvation.So when the opportunity presented itself, to save her.I did.And the tangled web began…Knowing her, but not letting her know me. Keeping her at arm's length when all I wanted to do was have her in my arms.Protecting her, because I finally fell.And the monster she needed protection from…Was me.
author: Kristin Vayden
